item.description: @the_lamp_person Goodyear blimp going back to the hanger here in Akron. I used to see it once in awhile when I was a kid in Cleveland, but I see it a lot around here—aaaand it never gets old.
item.source:markdown: @the_lamp_person Goodyear blimp going back to the hanger here in Akron. I used to see it once in awhile when I was a kid in Cleveland, but I see it a lot around here—aaaand it never gets old.

item.description: @reneritchie When are USB-C hub manufacturers going to start making hubs with 1 or 2 USB-A type ports and give me the 3 or more USB-C ports + a power pass through. I need more USB-C ports, not a bunch of legacy ports.
item.source:markdown: @reneritchie When are USB-C hub manufacturers going to start making hubs with 1 or 2 USB-A type ports and give me the 3 or more USB-C ports + a power pass through. I need more USB-C ports, not a bunch of legacy ports.
